name: Schrödinger's Parabox
description:
Schrödingers Parabox

This box is paradox. Those items as well. Take one. Put it in the box. Jump in the box. See what happens. It will change your life!

This collection of several minigames was created for the Epic Game Jam 2022. Every level was created with a specific item. Those items can be found in all other levels and might or might not have an impact on the playstyle.

Controls: WASD keys and mouse
